name: Interstellar Zangus
overview:
Interstellar Zangus (also known as Interstellar Fantasy 2 and Zangus) is an 1985 third-person shooter laserdisc game was developed by Funai and Gakken. It is the second game installment of Interstellar Laser Fantasy from previous from the first game. The game features of Hand drawn animation and CG background videos with also the ships rides of the main protagonist explore through the Space Fantasy defeating their the alien ships by multiple ships spawning in the space scenes. It has the undumped are converted that unknown developer didn’t public on Arcade Manufacturer, and resulted was Prototype game version unknown date at the time. Zangus never been appeared game and it was ended by Funai stopped produced to Laserdisc game are focuses goes onto the Television products.
Despite being direct-of-sequel that never been released in Japan and outside of Japan, Later for the 3 decades. It successor to Who Framed Miku Web-Media Universe capable was creating shapes and wire-frame in Anime Segment scene
